{'name': 'Leon Leypoldt'}]


	en: Track & Field Technique Course – Sprint, Jump & Throw
Want to improve your speed, jumping power, or throwing distance while focusing on 
refining your technique? Then this is the course for you! Under the guidance of two 
experienced coaches, you’ll learn the fundamental movement patterns of sprinting, 
jumping, and throwing – and work on executing them more efficiently and effectively.What 
to Expect:Sprinting &amp; Jumping: Explosive starts, optimal stride length, powerful 
take-offs, and smooth movement for greater speed and control.Throwing Events: Proper 
technique, improved force transfer, and clean movement execution for maximum distance 
in shot put, discus, and javelin.Course Details:
Who it's for: Beginners &amp; intermediate athletes looking to improve their technique
Equipment: Sportswear, optional: spikes or personal throwing equipment






This course will help you become faster, more explosive, and technically precise 
– whether you're building your foundation or ready to take your skills to the next 
level!




	de: Leichtathletik-Technikkurs – Sprint, Sprung & Wurf/Stoß
Du willst deine Schnelligkeit, Sprungkraft oder Wurfweite verbessern und dabei gezielt 
an deiner Technik arbeiten? Dann ist dieser Kurs genau das Richtige für dich! Unter 
Anleitung zwei spezialisierter Trainer lernst du die grundlegenden Bewegungsabläufe 
in Sprint/Sprung und Wurf/Stoß und optimierst deine Ausführung für mehr Effizienz 
und Leistung.Was dich erwartet:Sprint &amp; Sprung: Explosive Starts, optimale Schrittlänge, 
kraftvolle Absprünge und flüssige Bewegungsabläufe für mehr Dynamik und Effizienz.Wurf 
&amp; Stoß: Richtige Wurftechnik, verbesserte Kraftübertragung und präzise Bewegungsabläufe 
für maximale Weiten in Kugel, Diskus und Speer.Kursdetails:
Für wen? Anfänger &amp; Fortgeschrittene, die gezielt an ihrer Technik arbeiten möchten
Ausrüstung: Sportkleidung, optional Spikes oder eigene Wurfgeräte






Dieser Kurs hilft dir, schneller, explosiver und effizienter zu werden – egal, ob 
du deine Grundlagen festigen oder deine Technik auf das nächste Level bringen möchtest!


Lindy Hop: Gymnastikhalle 	 Montag 15:00 - 15:59 [{'name': 'Elena Romero-Fernandez'}, 
{'name': 'Marie Aedtner'}]


	en: Lindy Hop
At the end of the 1920s, something new emerged in Harlem, New York: Lindy Hop! An 
energetic African-American jazz dance. It is mainly danced with a partner and thrives 
on the creativity and musical interpretation of both dancers. Since the swing revival, 
it has conquered dance floors all over the world again and a young scene has also 
been developing in Regensburg for several years. In this course, you will learn the 
basics of the dance as well as cool moves for the next party. There are no special 
requirements for participation. Registering without a partner is no problem.




	de: Lindy Hop
Ende der 1920er entstand in Harlem, New York etwas Neues: Lindy Hop! Ein energiegeladener 
afroamerikanischer Jazz-Tanz. Er wird vor allem mit Partner getanzt und lebt von 
der Kreativität und Musikinterpretation beider Tänzer. Spätestens seit dem Swing-Revival 
erobert er wieder Tanzflächen auf der ganzen Welt und auch in Regensburg entwickelt 
sich seit einigen Jahren eine junge Szene. In diesem Kurs lernst du die Grundlagen 
des Tanzes sowie coole Moves für die nächste Party. Für die Teilnahme gibt es keine 
speziellen Voraussetzungen. Die Anmeldung ohne Partner ist kein Problem.


MTB Fahrtechnik Anfänger: Treffpunkt Eingang Sportzentrum 	 Dienstag 16:00 - 17:59 
[{'name': 'Markus Jährig'}]


	en: Mountainbike Skills Workshop for Beginners
Want to ride cool trails without having to get off and push your bike? Then this 
beginner-friendly course is perfect for you! You'll learn essential MTB techniques 
to ride safely and confidently while having fun on the trails.Course Content:Body 
Position &amp; Balance: A stable stance for better bike control.Braking Technique: 
Safe and controlled braking, even on loose terrain.Cornering Skills: Learn how to 
take turns smoothly and efficiently.Handling Obstacles: Techniques for small drops, 
roots, and trail challenges.Final Trail Ride: Apply your skills on a guided ride.Course 
Details:
Duration: 5 sessions, approx. 2 hours each
Meeting Point: Sports center entrance
Mountain Bike: Own bike recommended; rental bikes available from the sports center
Important Participation Requirements:Helmet required! No participation without a 
helmet.Protective gear (knee/elbow pads) recommended.Lighting: A powerful front light 
is mandatory for evening sessions.The bike must be fully functional, especially the 
brakes.Bring tools for minor repairs.






This course will give you the confidence to tackle trails safely—while having a blast!




	de: Mountainbike Fahrtechnik-Workshop für Anfänger
Du möchtest mit deinem Mountainbike endlich sicher coole Trails fahren, ohne ständig 
absteigen zu müssen? Dann ist dieser Einsteigerkurs genau das Richtige für dich! 
Hier lernst du die wichtigsten Fahrtechnik-Grundlagen, damit du mit mehr Sicherheit 
und Spaß unterwegs bist.Kursinhalte:Grundposition &amp; Balance: Eine stabile Haltung 
für bessere Kontrolle im Gelände.Richtig Bremsen: Sicheres Verzögern, auch auf lockerem 
Untergrund.Kurventechnik: Effizientes Fahren durch Kurven für mehr Flow.Hindernisse 
überwinden: Techniken für kleine Drops, Wurzeln und andere Trail-Herausforderungen.Abschlussausfahrt: 
Umsetzung des Gelernten auf einer gemeinsamen Runde.Kursdetails:
Dauer: 5 Termine, je ca. 2 Stunden
Treffpunkt: Pforte des Sportzentrums
Mountainbike: Eigenes Bike empfohlen; Leihbikes beim Sportzentrum verfügbar
Wichtige Hinweise zur Teilnahme:Helmpflicht! Ohne Helm keine Teilnahme.Protektoren 
(Knie, Ellenbogen) sind empfehlenswert.Beleuchtung: Für Abendkurse ist ein leistungsstarkes 
Frontlicht erforderlich.Das Fahrrad muss voll funktionsfähig sein (insbesondere die 
Bremsen).Werkzeug für kleinere Reparaturen sollte mitgebracht werden.






Dieser Kurs gibt dir das nötige Selbstvertrauen, um Trails sicher und mit einem breiten 
Grinsen zu meistern!




	de: None
Mountainbiking im Rahmen des Hochschulsports Bitte für alle Kurse folgendes zur Teilnahme 
berücksichtigen: - Helmpflicht - sonstige Protektoren sind empfehlenswert - für die 
Abendstunden ist leistungsstarkes Frontlicht Pflicht - Fahrrad muss voll funktionsfähig 
sein (insbesondere die Bremsen) - Werkzeug / Hilfsmittel für kleinere Reparaturen 
sollten dabei sein. Mountainbike Fahrtechnik Anfängerkurs: Du willst mit deinem Bike 
auch mal coole Trails bewältigen, ohne ständig absteigen und schieben zu müssen? 
Dann bist du in diesem Einsteigerkurs genau richtig, wir wollen dir die Basics auf 
dem Mountainbike vermitteln, damit auch du sicher mit einen breiten Grinsen unten 
ankommst. Zu den Basics der Fahrtechnik gehören eine stabile Grundposition und das 
Gleichgewicht auf dem Bike halten. Das richtige Bremsen auch auf lockerem Untergrund, 
Kurven richtig fahren und kleine Hindernisse auf dem Trail überwinden werden in diesem 
Lehrgang gemeinsam erarbeitet und mit vielen abwechslungsreichen Übungen erlernt, 
damit die abschließende Ausfahrt perfekt gelingt. Es wird empfohlen, das eigene Mountainbike 
mitzubringen. Andernfalls besteht die Möglichkeit, sich für jeden Einzeltermin ein 
Bike vom Sportzentrum auszuleihen. Gebühr: 8 EUR, zu bezahlen an der Pforte des Sportzentrums 
jeweils vor Kursbeginn. Der Kassenbeleg ist beim Kursleiter vorzulegen. Fünf Termine 
je Kurs, Dauer: ca. 2 Std. Treffpunkt: Pforte Sportzentrum Sportausweis bitte unaufgefordert 
dem Kursleiter vorlegen!


MTB Fahrtechnik Fortgeschrittene: Treffpunkt Eingang Sportzentrum 	 Dienstag 16:00 
- 17:59 [{'name': 'Markus Jährig'}]


	en: MTB Advanced Technique Course
Do you have that one tricky section, that one tight switchback, or that one drop 
you’ve been trying to master but haven’t quite nailed yet? Then this course is perfect 
for you!We will systematically improve your riding technique, helping you confidently 
tackle challenging terrain. Beyond focused technique exercises, we will apply what 
you learn directly on different trails – for more control, flow, and fun.Course Details:Prerequisites:
Off-road experience &amp; solid basic MTB skillsEquipment:
Own mountain bike required (no rental available from the sports center)
Helmet &amp; protective gear recommended
⚠ Important: Attendance at all sessions is highly recommended











	de: MTB Fahrtechnik für Fortgeschrittene
Kennst du diese eine knifflige Stelle, diese eine Spitzkehre oder diesen einen Absatz, 
den du immer wieder probierst, aber noch nicht sicher meisterst? Dann ist dieser 
Kurs genau das Richtige für dich!Gemeinsam arbeiten wir gezielt an deiner Fahrtechnik, 
um schwierige Passagen souverän zu bewältigen. Neben spezifischen Fahrtechnikübungen 
setzen wir das Gelernte direkt auf unterschiedlichen Trails um – für mehr Kontrolle, 
Flow und Fahrspaß.Kursdetails:Voraussetzungen:




Erfahrung im Gelände &amp; sichere Grundlagen der MTB-TechnikAusrüstung:
Eigenes Mountainbike erforderlich (kein Verleih durch das Sportzentrum)
Helm &amp; Schutzausrüstung empfohlen
⚠ Wichtig: Teilnahme an allen Terminen wird empfohlen


MTB Fahrtechnik Fortgeschrittene: Treffpunkt Eingang Sportzentrum 	 Donnerstag 16:00 
- 17:59 [{'name': 'Markus Jährig'}]


	en: MTB Advanced Technique Course
Do you have that one tricky section, that one tight switchback, or that one drop 
you’ve been trying to master but haven’t quite nailed yet? Then this course is perfect 
for you!We will systematically improve your riding technique, helping you confidently 
tackle challenging terrain. Beyond focused technique exercises, we will apply what 
you learn directly on different trails – for more control, flow, and fun.Course Details:Prerequisites:
Off-road experience &amp; solid basic MTB skillsEquipment:
Own mountain bike required (no rental available from the sports center)
Helmet &amp; protective gear recommended
⚠ Important: Attendance at all sessions is highly recommended











	de: MTB Fahrtechnik für Fortgeschrittene
Kennst du diese eine knifflige Stelle, diese eine Spitzkehre oder diesen einen Absatz, 
den du immer wieder probierst, aber noch nicht sicher meisterst? Dann ist dieser 
Kurs genau das Richtige für dich!Gemeinsam arbeiten wir gezielt an deiner Fahrtechnik, 
um schwierige Passagen souverän zu bewältigen. Neben spezifischen Fahrtechnikübungen 
setzen wir das Gelernte direkt auf unterschiedlichen Trails um – für mehr Kontrolle, 
Flow und Fahrspaß.Kursdetails:Voraussetzungen:




Erfahrung im Gelände &amp; sichere Grundlagen der MTB-TechnikAusrüstung:
Eigenes Mountainbike erforderlich (kein Verleih durch das Sportzentrum)
Helm &amp; Schutzausrüstung empfohlen
⚠ Wichtig: Teilnahme an allen Terminen wird empfohlen


Murph Prep: Calisthenics-Anlage 	 Mittwoch 16:00 - 16:59 [{'name': 'Alexander Glander'}, 
{'name': 'Lennart Philipp'}]


	en: Murph Challenge
The Murph Challenge comes from CrossFit and combines strength exercises with body 
weight with two 1-mile runs. When the weather is good, the workout is framed by these 
runs; when it's bad, it stays indoors. The intensity of the exercises is individually 
adjusted so that everyone has a chance of mastering the challenge.




	de: Murph Challenge
Die Murph Challenge stammt aus dem Crossfit und kombiniert Kraftübungen mit Körpergewicht 
mit zwei 1-Meile-Läufen zu Beginn und Ende des Trainings. Die Intensität der Übungen 
wird individuell angepasst, so dass jeder die Chance hat, die Challenge zu meistern!


Orientierungslauf: Rollhockeyplatz 	 Donnerstag 15:30 - 16:59 [{'name': 'Timon Lorenz'}]


	en: Orienteering
Orienteering is a nature sport that combines running with navigation. The goal is 
to reach points on the map using the fastest route while reading the map and observing 
the terrain. This course is for beginners and introduces the basics of orienteering 
and map reading with a compass. Experienced athletes can also improve their skills.Training 
mainly takes place in urban terrain. Simple running shoes are enough; additional 
equipment can be borrowed if needed. The meeting point for the first two weeks is 
at the announcer's booth at the university stadium next to the climbing tower. Newcomers 
are always welcome!




	de: Orientierungslauf
Orientierungslauf ist ein Natursport, der sowohl die Lauf- als auch die Orientierungsfähigkeiten 
trainiert. Es geht darum, auf einer Karte eingezeichnete Punkte schnell und effizient 
zu erreichen, dabei die Route zu wählen und das Gelände im Blick zu behalten. Der 
Kurs richtet sich an Anfänger und Interessierte und vermittelt die Grundlagen des 
Orientierungslaufs und Kartenlesens mit Kompass. Erfahrene Athleten können ebenfalls 
ihre Fähigkeiten schärfen.
Das Training findet hauptsächlich im urbanen Gelände statt. Laufschuhe reichen aus, 
weiteres Equipment kann nach Bedarf ausgeliehen werden. Treffpunkt in den ersten 
zwei Wochen: Sprecherkabine beim Uni-Stadion. Späterer Einstieg ist ebenfalls möglich.&nbsp;


Parkour: Turnhalle 	 Freitag 17:00 - 18:29 [{'name': 'Andreas Vogelsberg'}, {'name': 
'Edgar Töws'}]


	en: Parkour
Parkour is a movement discipline that originated in the Paris suburbs. It's about 
finding challenges and new paths in the urban environment based on your own requirements. 
The physical training (strength &amp; flexibility) is therefore based on the physical 
requirements. The course is open to all levels, whether you're a beginner or advanced.




	de: Parkour
Parkour ist eine Bewegungsdisziplin, entstanden in den Pariser Vororten. Dabei geht 
es darum, sich anhand der eigenen Voraussetzungen Herausforderungen und neue Wege 
in der urbanen Umgebung zu suchen. Das körperliche Training (Kraft &amp; Beweglichkeit) 
orientiert sich daher an den physischen Anforderungen. Der Kurs ist offen für alle 
Levels, egal ob Neulinge oder Fortgeschrittene.


Parkour: Slacklineanlage 	 Dienstag 15:30 - 16:59 [{'name': 'Andreas Vogelsberg'}, 
{'name': 'Edgar Töws'}]


	en: Parkour
Parkour is a movement discipline that originated in the Paris suburbs. It's about 
finding challenges and new paths in the urban environment based on your own requirements. 
The physical training (strength &amp; flexibility) is therefore based on the physical 
requirements. The course is open to all levels, whether you're a beginner or advanced.




	de: Parkour
Parkour ist eine Bewegungsdisziplin, entstanden in den Pariser Vororten. Dabei geht 
es darum, sich anhand der eigenen Voraussetzungen Herausforderungen und neue Wege 
in der urbanen Umgebung zu suchen. Das körperliche Training (Kraft &amp; Beweglichkeit) 
orientiert sich daher an den physischen Anforderungen. Der Kurs ist offen für alle 
Levels, egal ob Neulinge oder Fortgeschrittene.


Pilates 1: Turnhalle 	 Dienstag 17:00 - 17:59 [{'name': 'Anastasiia Lohvina'}]


	en: Pilates
The focus of our Pilates lessons is on balance and mobility exercises, which are 
performed both standing and on the mat. The aim of the course is to develop more 
mobility and flexibility in the body. During the lessons, controlled isolation of 
certain parts of the body is also practiced, which leads to more mobility of the 
entire body. There is something for everyone who wants to be more flexible in everyday 
life. The course is also recommended for all dance enthusiasts, as we also focus 
on our core, which is important for stability when performing various dances. Gentle 
stretching exercises for the inner muscles round off the profile of the course. Please 
bring your own mat.




	de: Pilates
Im Fokus unseres Pilates-Unterrichts stehen Balance und Mobilitätsübungen, die sowohl 
im Stehen als auch auf der Matte ausgeführt werden. Ziel des Kurses ist, mehr Beweglichkeit 
und Flexibilität des Körpers zu entwickeln. Während des Unterrichts werden auch kontrollierte 
Isolationen bestimmter Körperteile geübt, die zur mehr Mobilität des gesamten Körpers 
führen. Hier findet jeder für sich etwas, der flexibler im Alltagsleben sein möchte. 
Zudem ist der Kurs empfehlenswert für alle Tanzbegeisterten, da wir uns auch mit 
unserer Körpermitte beschäftigen, die für die Stabilität bei der Ausführung verschiedener 
Tänze wichtig ist. Sanfte Dehnungsübungen der Innenmuskeln runden das Profil des 
Kurses ab.&nbsp;Bitte eigene Gymnastikmatte mitbringen!

Power Vinyasa Yoga: Gymnastikhalle 	 Donnerstag 15:00 - 15:59 [{'name': 'Lisa Mönch'}]


	de: Power Vinyasa Yoga
Dieser Kurs ist für alle, die Yoga mit einer sportlichen Herausforderung verbinden 
möchten. Power Vinyasa Yoga kombiniert fließende Bewegungen mit kraftvollen Haltungen 
und gezielter Atmung. Die dynamischen Sequenzen stärken den gesamten Körper, fördern 
die Beweglichkeit und bringen gleichzeitig mentale Klarheit.Was dich erwartet:Fließende 
Abläufe: Dynamische Übergänge zwischen den Asanas für mehr Kraft &amp; Flexibilität.Kräftigung 
&amp; Stabilität: Intensive Haltepositionen und Core-Training.Atmung &amp; Fokus: 
Verbindung von Bewegung und Atem für eine meditative Praxis.Energie &amp; Flow: Ein 
Workout für Körper und Geist, das dich herausfordert und gleichzeitig entspannt.Kursdetails:
Level: Mittelstufe bis Fortgeschrittene – Grundkenntnisse im Vinyasa Yoga empfohlen
Mitbringen: Bequeme Kleidung, eigene Matte, Wasser





Dieser Kurs ist perfekt für alle, die dynamisches Yoga lieben, Kraft aufbauen und 
gleichzeitig tiefer in die Verbindung von Atmung und Bewegung eintauchen möchten.&nbsp;Bitte 
eigene Yogamatte mitbringen!




	en: Power Vinyasa Yoga
This class is perfect for those looking to combine yoga with a physical challenge. 
Power Vinyasa Yoga blends flowing movements, strong postures, and mindful breathing. 
The dynamic sequences build strength, enhance flexibility, and bring mental clarity.What 
to Expect:Fluid Sequences: Smooth transitions between poses to improve strength &amp; 
flexibility.Strength &amp; Stability: Core activation and powerful holds for a strong 
foundation.Breath &amp; Focus: Synchronizing movement and breath for a meditative 
experience.Energy &amp; Flow: A full-body workout that challenges and revitalizes 
you.Course Details:
Level: Intermediate to advanced – basic Vinyasa knowledge recommended
What to bring: Comfortable clothes, yoga mat, water





This class is ideal for those who love dynamic yoga, want to build strength, and 
deepen their connection between movement and breath. Please bring your own mat!

	en: Power & Stretch
Want to increase your flexibility while also building strength and energy? Then this

tension, and strengthen your entire body.Perfect as a recovery session, cross-training, 
or simply to feel good and move better.Course Details:





Target group: Anyone looking to improve flexibility and strength


Focus: Dynamic and static stretching, strength training, mobility work


Goal: More flexibility, strength, and overall body awareness

What to bring: Comfortable sportswear, mat and water bottle




	de: Power & Stretch

und neue Energie tanken? Dann ist dieser Kurs genau das Richtige für dich!Power &amp; 
Stretch kombiniert intensives Stretching mit kräftigenden Übungen – so mobilisierst 
du deine Muskulatur, löst Verspannungen und stärkst deinen Körper ganzheitlich.Ideal 
als Ausgleich zum Alltagsstress, nach dem Training oder zur allgemeinen Kräftigung.Kursdetails:





Zielgruppe: Alle, die Beweglichkeit und Kraft verbessern möchten


Inhalte: Dynamisches und statisches Dehnen, Körperkräftigung, Mobilisation


Ziel: Mehr Flexibilität, Kraft und ein besseres Körpergefühl

Ausrüstung: Bequeme Sportkleidung, Matte und Trinkflasche

ReLoco Crew: Gymnastikhalle 	 Mittwoch 19:00 - 19:59 [{'name': 'Olga Faßler'}]


	en: ReLoco Crew
From the repertoire of choreographies learned in the "Street Dance/ Hip Hop - Advanced" 
course, a program is put together in this course with which the dance group ReLoco 
Crew represents the University of Regensburg in competitions and performances at 
various shows. Participation requirements: Regular attendance of the course: "Street 
Dance/ Hip Hop - Advanced Course" as well as time for extra training.




	de: ReLoco Crew
Aus dem Repertoire der Choreographien, die im "Hip Hop - Fortgeschrittene" Kurs erlernt 
wurden, wird in diesem Kurs ein Programm zusammengestellt, mit dem die Tanzgruppe 
ReLoco Crew die Universität Regensburg bei Wettkämpfen und Auftritten bei diversen 
Shows repräsentiert. Teilnahmevoraussetzung: Regelmäßiger Besuch des Kurses: "Hip 
Hop - Fortgeschrittenenkurs" sowie Zeit für Extratraining.


Rettungsschwimmen 1: Schwimmhalle 	 Montag 14:00 - 14:59 [{'name': 'Theresa Rösch'}]


	de:  Rettungsschwimmen
Kurs zum Erwerb des Rettungsschwimmabzeichens. Der Kurs beinhaltet viele praktische 
Übungseinheiten sowie auch theoretische Termine. Die Teilnehmer erhalten zu Beginn 
einen Kursplan mit einer Kurzbeschreibung der verschiedenen Einheiten. Abgeschlossen 
wird der Kurs mit der praktischen Prüfung zur Erreichung des Rettungsschwimmabzeichens 
und mit der theoretischen Multiple-Choice-Prüfung. (Keine Sorge, alle Inhalte dafür 
erlernt ihr im Kurs und es bedarf keinerlei Vorwissen.) 




	en: Lifesaving Course
Course to acquire the lifeguard badge. The course includes many practical training 
units as well as theoretical sessions. At the beginning, participants receive a course 
plan with a brief description of the various units. The course concludes with the 
practical test to obtain the lifeguard badge and the theoretical multiple-choice 
test. (Don't worry, you will learn all the content in the course and no prior knowledge 
is required)&nbsp;


Rettungsschwimmen 1: Beachvolleyball 1 B 	 Donnerstag 12:00 - 12:59 []


	de:  Rettungsschwimmen
Kurs zum Erwerb des Rettungsschwimmabzeichens. Der Kurs beinhaltet viele praktische 
Übungseinheiten sowie auch theoretische Termine. Die Teilnehmer erhalten zu Beginn 
einen Kursplan mit einer Kurzbeschreibung der verschiedenen Einheiten. Abgeschlossen 
wird der Kurs mit der praktischen Prüfung zur Erreichung des Rettungsschwimmabzeichens 
und mit der theoretischen Multiple-Choice-Prüfung. (Keine Sorge, alle Inhalte dafür 
erlernt ihr im Kurs und es bedarf keinerlei Vorwissen.) 




	en: Lifesaving Course

units as well as theoretical sessions. At the beginning, participants receive a course 
plan with a brief description of the various units. The course concludes with the 
practical test to obtain the lifeguard badge and the theoretical multiple-choice 
test. (Don't worry, you will learn all the content in the course and no prior knowledge 
is required)&nbsp;

Rudern A1: Ruder-Klub Regensburg Bootshaus 	 Freitag 15:00 - 17:59 [{'name': 'Daniel 
Baruth'}]


	en: Rowing for Beginners
Rowing on the Danube and Naab: When rowing in university sports, you can learn the 
common boat maneuvers, team coordination in a stable double four, as well as steering 
and balance in a narrow single. Participation is only possible for experienced swimmers 
/ free swimmers and only if there are no health concerns about the sport of rowing. 
All course participants (including free rowing) are recommended to take out liability 
insurance. Beginners' course: Learning the basics of rowing technique; depending 
on the temperature, wind and water level, approximately the first half of the semester 
as a team in a double four and the second in a single (racing boat form). Meeting 
point: Boathouse of the Regensburg Rowing Club, Messerschmittstrasse 2




	de: Rudern A

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Rudern auf
Donau und Naab<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE"> 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Beim Rudern im
Hochschulsport könnt ihr die gängigen Bootsmanöver, die Mannschaftskoordination
im stabilen Doppelvierer sowie das Steuern und die Balance im schmalen Einer
lernen. 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;<span style="font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Erlernen der
Grundlagen der Rudertechnik; je nach Temperatur, Wind und Pegelstand ungefähr
die erste Hälfte des Semesters als Mannschaft im Doppelvierer und die zweite im
Einer (Rennbootform).

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Voraussetzungen:

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">ausreichende Schwimmfähigkeit
("Freischwimmer" bzw. Bronzeabzeichen)

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">keine gesundheitlichen Bedenken gegen die
Sportart Rudern

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Empfehlung des Abschließens einer
Haftpflichtversicherung (falls nicht vorhanden) 

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">sorgfältige Lektüre der Fahrtordnung und Revierinfos
sowie die Abgabe der unterschriebenen <span style="color:#4C94D8;mso-themecolor:
text2;mso-themetint:128">Ruder-Bestätigung bei der Kursleitung

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Treffpunkt: Bootshaus des Regensburger Ruderklubs, 
Messerschmittstraße 2



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">




Rudern A1: Ruder-Klub Regensburg Bootshaus 	 Freitag 15:00 - 16:29 [{'name': 'Daniel 
Baruth'}]


	en: Rowing for Beginners
Rowing on the Danube and Naab: When rowing in university sports, you can learn the 
common boat maneuvers, team coordination in a stable double four, as well as steering 
and balance in a narrow single. Participation is only possible for experienced swimmers 
/ free swimmers and only if there are no health concerns about the sport of rowing. 
All course participants (including free rowing) are recommended to take out liability 
insurance. Beginners' course: Learning the basics of rowing technique; depending 
on the temperature, wind and water level, approximately the first half of the semester 
as a team in a double four and the second in a single (racing boat form). Meeting 
point: Boathouse of the Regensburg Rowing Club, Messerschmittstrasse 2




	de: Rudern A

	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}

 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Rudern auf
Donau und Naab<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE"> 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Beim Rudern im
Hochschulsport könnt ihr die gängigen Bootsmanöver, die Mannschaftskoordination
im stabilen Doppelvierer sowie das Steuern und die Balance im schmalen Einer
lernen. 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;<span style="font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Erlernen der
Grundlagen der Rudertechnik; je nach Temperatur, Wind und Pegelstand ungefähr
die erste Hälfte des Semesters als Mannschaft im Doppelvierer und die zweite im
Einer (Rennbootform).

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Voraussetzungen:

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">ausreichende Schwimmfähigkeit
("Freischwimmer" bzw. Bronzeabzeichen)

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">keine gesundheitlichen Bedenken gegen die
Sportart Rudern

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Empfehlung des Abschließens einer
Haftpflichtversicherung (falls nicht vorhanden) 

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">sorgfältige Lektüre der Fahrtordnung und Revierinfos
sowie die Abgabe der unterschriebenen <span style="color:#4C94D8;mso-themecolor:
text2;mso-themetint:128">Ruder-Bestätigung bei der Kursleitung

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Treffpunkt: Bootshaus des Regensburger Ruderklubs, 
Messerschmittstraße 2



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">




Rudern A1: Ruder-Klub Regensburg Bootshaus 2/2 	 Freitag 15:00 - 17:59 [{'name': 
'Daniel Baruth'}]


	en: Rowing for Beginners
Rowing on the Danube and Naab: When rowing in university sports, you can learn the 
common boat maneuvers, team coordination in a stable double four, as well as steering 
and balance in a narrow single. Participation is only possible for experienced swimmers 
/ free swimmers and only if there are no health concerns about the sport of rowing. 
All course participants (including free rowing) are recommended to take out liability 
insurance. Beginners' course: Learning the basics of rowing technique; depending 
on the temperature, wind and water level, approximately the first half of the semester 
as a team in a double four and the second in a single (racing boat form). Meeting 
point: Boathouse of the Regensburg Rowing Club, Messerschmittstrasse 2




	de: Rudern A

 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}

none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Rudern auf
Donau und Naab<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE"> 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Beim Rudern im
Hochschulsport könnt ihr die gängigen Bootsmanöver, die Mannschaftskoordination
im stabilen Doppelvierer sowie das Steuern und die Balance im schmalen Einer
lernen. 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;<span style="font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Erlernen der
Grundlagen der Rudertechnik; je nach Temperatur, Wind und Pegelstand ungefähr
die erste Hälfte des Semesters als Mannschaft im Doppelvierer und die zweite im
Einer (Rennbootform).

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Voraussetzungen:

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">ausreichende Schwimmfähigkeit
("Freischwimmer" bzw. Bronzeabzeichen)

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">keine gesundheitlichen Bedenken gegen die
Sportart Rudern

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Empfehlung des Abschließens einer
Haftpflichtversicherung (falls nicht vorhanden) 

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">sorgfältige Lektüre der Fahrtordnung und Revierinfos
sowie die Abgabe der unterschriebenen <span style="color:#4C94D8;mso-themecolor:
text2;mso-themetint:128">Ruder-Bestätigung bei der Kursleitung

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Treffpunkt: Bootshaus des Regensburger Ruderklubs, 
Messerschmittstraße 2



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">




Rudern A1: Ruder-Klub Regensburg Bootshaus 	 Freitag 16:30 - 17:59 [{'name': 'Daniel 
Baruth'}]


	en: Rowing for Beginners
Rowing on the Danube and Naab: When rowing in university sports, you can learn the 
common boat maneuvers, team coordination in a stable double four, as well as steering 
and balance in a narrow single. Participation is only possible for experienced swimmers 
/ free swimmers and only if there are no health concerns about the sport of rowing. 
All course participants (including free rowing) are recommended to take out liability 
insurance. Beginners' course: Learning the basics of rowing technique; depending 
on the temperature, wind and water level, approximately the first half of the semester 
as a team in a double four and the second in a single (racing boat form). Meeting 
point: Boathouse of the Regensburg Rowing Club, Messerschmittstrasse 2




	de: Rudern A

 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}

 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Rudern auf
Donau und Naab<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE"> 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Beim Rudern im
Hochschulsport könnt ihr die gängigen Bootsmanöver, die Mannschaftskoordination
im stabilen Doppelvierer sowie das Steuern und die Balance im schmalen Einer
lernen. 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;<span style="font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Erlernen der
Grundlagen der Rudertechnik; je nach Temperatur, Wind und Pegelstand ungefähr
die erste Hälfte des Semesters als Mannschaft im Doppelvierer und die zweite im
Einer (Rennbootform).

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Voraussetzungen:

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">ausreichende Schwimmfähigkeit
("Freischwimmer" bzw. Bronzeabzeichen)

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">keine gesundheitlichen Bedenken gegen die
Sportart Rudern

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Empfehlung des Abschließens einer
Haftpflichtversicherung (falls nicht vorhanden) 

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">sorgfältige Lektüre der Fahrtordnung und Revierinfos
sowie die Abgabe der unterschriebenen <span style="color:#4C94D8;mso-themecolor:
text2;mso-themetint:128">Ruder-Bestätigung bei der Kursleitung

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Treffpunkt: Bootshaus des Regensburger Ruderklubs, 
Messerschmittstraße 2



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">




Rudern A1: Ruder-Klub Regensburg Bootshaus 	 Donnerstag 13:30 - 16:29 [{'name': 'Daniel 
Baruth'}]


	en: Rowing for Beginners
Rowing on the Danube and Naab: When rowing in university sports, you can learn the 
common boat maneuvers, team coordination in a stable double four, as well as steering 
and balance in a narrow single. Participation is only possible for experienced swimmers 
/ free swimmers and only if there are no health concerns about the sport of rowing. 
All course participants (including free rowing) are recommended to take out liability 
insurance. Beginners' course: Learning the basics of rowing technique; depending 
on the temperature, wind and water level, approximately the first half of the semester 
as a team in a double four and the second in a single (racing boat form). Meeting 
point: Boathouse of the Regensburg Rowing Club, Messerschmittstrasse 2




	de: Rudern A

 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}

line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Rudern auf
Donau und Naab<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE"> 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Beim Rudern im
Hochschulsport könnt ihr die gängigen Bootsmanöver, die Mannschaftskoordination
im stabilen Doppelvierer sowie das Steuern und die Balance im schmalen Einer
lernen. 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;<span style="font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Erlernen der
Grundlagen der Rudertechnik; je nach Temperatur, Wind und Pegelstand ungefähr
die erste Hälfte des Semesters als Mannschaft im Doppelvierer und die zweite im
Einer (Rennbootform).

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Voraussetzungen:

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">ausreichende Schwimmfähigkeit
("Freischwimmer" bzw. Bronzeabzeichen)

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">keine gesundheitlichen Bedenken gegen die
Sportart Rudern

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Empfehlung des Abschließens einer
Haftpflichtversicherung (falls nicht vorhanden) 

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">sorgfältige Lektüre der Fahrtordnung und Revierinfos
sowie die Abgabe der unterschriebenen <span style="color:#4C94D8;mso-themecolor:
text2;mso-themetint:128">Ruder-Bestätigung bei der Kursleitung

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Treffpunkt: Bootshaus des Regensburger Ruderklubs, 
Messerschmittstraße 2



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">




Rudern A1: Ruder-Klub Regensburg Bootshaus 	 Donnerstag 13:30 - 14:59 [{'name': 'Daniel 
Baruth'}]


	en: Rowing for Beginners
Rowing on the Danube and Naab: When rowing in university sports, you can learn the 
common boat maneuvers, team coordination in a stable double four, as well as steering 
and balance in a narrow single. Participation is only possible for experienced swimmers 
/ free swimmers and only if there are no health concerns about the sport of rowing. 
All course participants (including free rowing) are recommended to take out liability 
insurance. Beginners' course: Learning the basics of rowing technique; depending 
on the temperature, wind and water level, approximately the first half of the semester 
as a team in a double four and the second in a single (racing boat form). Meeting 
point: Boathouse of the Regensburg Rowing Club, Messerschmittstrasse 2




	de: Rudern A

 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;

 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Rudern auf
Donau und Naab<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE"> 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Beim Rudern im
Hochschulsport könnt ihr die gängigen Bootsmanöver, die Mannschaftskoordination
im stabilen Doppelvierer sowie das Steuern und die Balance im schmalen Einer
lernen. 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;<span style="font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Erlernen der
Grundlagen der Rudertechnik; je nach Temperatur, Wind und Pegelstand ungefähr
die erste Hälfte des Semesters als Mannschaft im Doppelvierer und die zweite im
Einer (Rennbootform).

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Voraussetzungen:

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">ausreichende Schwimmfähigkeit
("Freischwimmer" bzw. Bronzeabzeichen)

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">keine gesundheitlichen Bedenken gegen die
Sportart Rudern

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Empfehlung des Abschließens einer
Haftpflichtversicherung (falls nicht vorhanden) 

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">sorgfältige Lektüre der Fahrtordnung und Revierinfos
sowie die Abgabe der unterschriebenen <span style="color:#4C94D8;mso-themecolor:
text2;mso-themetint:128">Ruder-Bestätigung bei der Kursleitung

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Treffpunkt: Bootshaus des Regensburger Ruderklubs, 
Messerschmittstraße 2



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">




Rudern A1: Ruder-Klub Regensburg Bootshaus 2/2 	 Donnerstag 13:30 - 14:59 [{'name': 
'Daniel Baruth'}]


	en: Rowing for Beginners
Rowing on the Danube and Naab: When rowing in university sports, you can learn the 
common boat maneuvers, team coordination in a stable double four, as well as steering 
and balance in a narrow single. Participation is only possible for experienced swimmers 
/ free swimmers and only if there are no health concerns about the sport of rowing. 
All course participants (including free rowing) are recommended to take out liability 
insurance. Beginners' course: Learning the basics of rowing technique; depending 
on the temperature, wind and water level, approximately the first half of the semester 
as a team in a double four and the second in a single (racing boat form). Meeting 
point: Boathouse of the Regensburg Rowing Club, Messerschmittstrasse 2




	de: Rudern A

	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}

 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Rudern auf
Donau und Naab<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE"> 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Beim Rudern im
Hochschulsport könnt ihr die gängigen Bootsmanöver, die Mannschaftskoordination
im stabilen Doppelvierer sowie das Steuern und die Balance im schmalen Einer
lernen. 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;<span style="font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Erlernen der
Grundlagen der Rudertechnik; je nach Temperatur, Wind und Pegelstand ungefähr
die erste Hälfte des Semesters als Mannschaft im Doppelvierer und die zweite im
Einer (Rennbootform).

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Voraussetzungen:

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">ausreichende Schwimmfähigkeit
("Freischwimmer" bzw. Bronzeabzeichen)

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">keine gesundheitlichen Bedenken gegen die
Sportart Rudern

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Empfehlung des Abschließens einer
Haftpflichtversicherung (falls nicht vorhanden) 

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">sorgfältige Lektüre der Fahrtordnung und Revierinfos
sowie die Abgabe der unterschriebenen <span style="color:#4C94D8;mso-themecolor:
text2;mso-themetint:128">Ruder-Bestätigung bei der Kursleitung

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Treffpunkt: Bootshaus des Regensburger Ruderklubs, 
Messerschmittstraße 2



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">




Rudern A1: Ruder-Klub Regensburg Bootshaus 	 Donnerstag 15:00 - 16:29 [{'name': 'Daniel 
Baruth'}]


	en: Rowing for Beginners
Rowing on the Danube and Naab: When rowing in university sports, you can learn the 
common boat maneuvers, team coordination in a stable double four, as well as steering 
and balance in a narrow single. Participation is only possible for experienced swimmers 
/ free swimmers and only if there are no health concerns about the sport of rowing. 
All course participants (including free rowing) are recommended to take out liability 
insurance. Beginners' course: Learning the basics of rowing technique; depending 
on the temperature, wind and water level, approximately the first half of the semester 
as a team in a double four and the second in a single (racing boat form). Meeting 
point: Boathouse of the Regensburg Rowing Club, Messerschmittstrasse 2




	de: Rudern A

 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}

none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Rudern auf
Donau und Naab<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE"> 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Beim Rudern im
Hochschulsport könnt ihr die gängigen Bootsmanöver, die Mannschaftskoordination
im stabilen Doppelvierer sowie das Steuern und die Balance im schmalen Einer
lernen. 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;<span style="font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Erlernen der
Grundlagen der Rudertechnik; je nach Temperatur, Wind und Pegelstand ungefähr
die erste Hälfte des Semesters als Mannschaft im Doppelvierer und die zweite im
Einer (Rennbootform).

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Voraussetzungen:

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">ausreichende Schwimmfähigkeit
("Freischwimmer" bzw. Bronzeabzeichen)

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">keine gesundheitlichen Bedenken gegen die
Sportart Rudern

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Empfehlung des Abschließens einer
Haftpflichtversicherung (falls nicht vorhanden) 

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">sorgfältige Lektüre der Fahrtordnung und Revierinfos
sowie die Abgabe der unterschriebenen <span style="color:#4C94D8;mso-themecolor:
text2;mso-themetint:128">Ruder-Bestätigung bei der Kursleitung

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Treffpunkt: Bootshaus des Regensburger Ruderklubs, 
Messerschmittstraße 2



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">




Rudern A1: Ruder-Klub Regensburg Bootshaus 	 Montag 16:30 - 17:59 [{'name': 'Daniel 
Baruth'}, {'name': 'Johann Rampl'}]


	en: Rowing for Beginners
Rowing on the Danube and Naab: When rowing in university sports, you can learn the 
common boat maneuvers, team coordination in a stable double four, as well as steering 
and balance in a narrow single. Participation is only possible for experienced swimmers 
/ free swimmers and only if there are no health concerns about the sport of rowing. 
All course participants (including free rowing) are recommended to take out liability 
insurance. Beginners' course: Learning the basics of rowing technique; depending 
on the temperature, wind and water level, approximately the first half of the semester 
as a team in a double four and the second in a single (racing boat form). Meeting 
point: Boathouse of the Regensburg Rowing Club, Messerschmittstrasse 2




	de: Rudern A
