 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}

none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Rudern auf
Donau und Naab<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE"> 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Beim Rudern im
Hochschulsport könnt ihr die gängigen Bootsmanöver, die Mannschaftskoordination
im stabilen Doppelvierer sowie das Steuern und die Balance im schmalen Einer
lernen. 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;<span style="font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Erlernen der
Grundlagen der Rudertechnik; je nach Temperatur, Wind und Pegelstand ungefähr
die erste Hälfte des Semesters als Mannschaft im Doppelvierer und die zweite im
Einer (Rennbootform).

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Voraussetzungen:

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">ausreichende Schwimmfähigkeit
("Freischwimmer" bzw. Bronzeabzeichen)

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">keine gesundheitlichen Bedenken gegen die
Sportart Rudern

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Empfehlung des Abschließens einer
Haftpflichtversicherung (falls nicht vorhanden) 

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">sorgfältige Lektüre der Fahrtordnung und Revierinfos
sowie die Abgabe der unterschriebenen <span style="color:#4C94D8;mso-themecolor:
text2;mso-themetint:128">Ruder-Bestätigung bei der Kursleitung

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Treffpunkt: Bootshaus des Regensburger Ruderklubs, 
Messerschmittstraße 2



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">




Rudern A1: Ruder-Klub Regensburg Bootshaus 	 Montag 15:00 - 17:59 [{'name': 'Daniel 
Baruth'}, {'name': 'Johann Rampl'}]


	en: Rowing for Beginners
Rowing on the Danube and Naab: When rowing in university sports, you can learn the 
common boat maneuvers, team coordination in a stable double four, as well as steering 
and balance in a narrow single. Participation is only possible for experienced swimmers 
/ free swimmers and only if there are no health concerns about the sport of rowing. 
All course participants (including free rowing) are recommended to take out liability 
insurance. Beginners' course: Learning the basics of rowing technique; depending 
on the temperature, wind and water level, approximately the first half of the semester 
as a team in a double four and the second in a single (racing boat form). Meeting 
point: Boathouse of the Regensburg Rowing Club, Messerschmittstrasse 2




	de: Rudern A

 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}

line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Rudern auf
Donau und Naab<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE"> 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Beim Rudern im
Hochschulsport könnt ihr die gängigen Bootsmanöver, die Mannschaftskoordination
im stabilen Doppelvierer sowie das Steuern und die Balance im schmalen Einer
lernen. 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;<span style="font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Erlernen der
Grundlagen der Rudertechnik; je nach Temperatur, Wind und Pegelstand ungefähr
die erste Hälfte des Semesters als Mannschaft im Doppelvierer und die zweite im
Einer (Rennbootform).

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Voraussetzungen:

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">ausreichende Schwimmfähigkeit
("Freischwimmer" bzw. Bronzeabzeichen)

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">keine gesundheitlichen Bedenken gegen die
Sportart Rudern

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Empfehlung des Abschließens einer
Haftpflichtversicherung (falls nicht vorhanden) 

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">sorgfältige Lektüre der Fahrtordnung und Revierinfos
sowie die Abgabe der unterschriebenen <span style="color:#4C94D8;mso-themecolor:
text2;mso-themetint:128">Ruder-Bestätigung bei der Kursleitung

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Treffpunkt: Bootshaus des Regensburger Ruderklubs, 
Messerschmittstraße 2



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">




Rudern A1: Ruder-Klub Regensburg Bootshaus 	 Dienstag 13:15 - 14:44 [{'name': 'Sepp 
Espach'}]


	en: Rowing for Beginners
Rowing on the Danube and Naab: When rowing in university sports, you can learn the 
common boat maneuvers, team coordination in a stable double four, as well as steering 
and balance in a narrow single. Participation is only possible for experienced swimmers 
/ free swimmers and only if there are no health concerns about the sport of rowing. 
All course participants (including free rowing) are recommended to take out liability 
insurance. Beginners' course: Learning the basics of rowing technique; depending 
on the temperature, wind and water level, approximately the first half of the semester 
as a team in a double four and the second in a single (racing boat form). Meeting 
point: Boathouse of the Regensburg Rowing Club, Messerschmittstrasse 2




	de: Rudern A

 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Rudern auf
Donau und Naab<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE"> 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Beim Rudern im
Hochschulsport könnt ihr die gängigen Bootsmanöver, die Mannschaftskoordination
im stabilen Doppelvierer sowie das Steuern und die Balance im schmalen Einer
lernen. 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;<span style="font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Erlernen der
Grundlagen der Rudertechnik; je nach Temperatur, Wind und Pegelstand ungefähr
die erste Hälfte des Semesters als Mannschaft im Doppelvierer und die zweite im
Einer (Rennbootform).

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Voraussetzungen:

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">ausreichende Schwimmfähigkeit
("Freischwimmer" bzw. Bronzeabzeichen)

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">keine gesundheitlichen Bedenken gegen die
Sportart Rudern

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Empfehlung des Abschließens einer
Haftpflichtversicherung (falls nicht vorhanden) 

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">sorgfältige Lektüre der Fahrtordnung und Revierinfos
sowie die Abgabe der unterschriebenen <span style="color:#4C94D8;mso-themecolor:
text2;mso-themetint:128">Ruder-Bestätigung bei der Kursleitung

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Treffpunkt: Bootshaus des Regensburger Ruderklubs, 
Messerschmittstraße 2



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">




Rudern A1: Ruder-Klub Regensburg Bootshaus 2/2 	 Dienstag 15:00 - 16:29 [{'name': 
'Erik Gerhart'}]


	en: Rowing for Beginners
Rowing on the Danube and Naab: When rowing in university sports, you can learn the 
common boat maneuvers, team coordination in a stable double four, as well as steering 
and balance in a narrow single. Participation is only possible for experienced swimmers 
/ free swimmers and only if there are no health concerns about the sport of rowing. 
All course participants (including free rowing) are recommended to take out liability 
insurance. Beginners' course: Learning the basics of rowing technique; depending 
on the temperature, wind and water level, approximately the first half of the semester 
as a team in a double four and the second in a single (racing boat form). Meeting 
point: Boathouse of the Regensburg Rowing Club, Messerschmittstrasse 2




	de: Rudern A

	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}

 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Rudern auf
Donau und Naab<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE"> 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Beim Rudern im
Hochschulsport könnt ihr die gängigen Bootsmanöver, die Mannschaftskoordination
im stabilen Doppelvierer sowie das Steuern und die Balance im schmalen Einer
lernen. 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;<span style="font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Erlernen der
Grundlagen der Rudertechnik; je nach Temperatur, Wind und Pegelstand ungefähr
die erste Hälfte des Semesters als Mannschaft im Doppelvierer und die zweite im
Einer (Rennbootform).

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Voraussetzungen:

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">ausreichende Schwimmfähigkeit
("Freischwimmer" bzw. Bronzeabzeichen)

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">keine gesundheitlichen Bedenken gegen die
Sportart Rudern

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Empfehlung des Abschließens einer
Haftpflichtversicherung (falls nicht vorhanden) 

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">sorgfältige Lektüre der Fahrtordnung und Revierinfos
sowie die Abgabe der unterschriebenen <span style="color:#4C94D8;mso-themecolor:
text2;mso-themetint:128">Ruder-Bestätigung bei der Kursleitung

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Treffpunkt: Bootshaus des Regensburger Ruderklubs, 
Messerschmittstraße 2



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">




Rudern A1: Ruder-Klub Regensburg Bootshaus 	 Mittwoch 15:00 - 16:29 [{'name': 'Benedikt 
Lintl'}]


	en: Rowing for Beginners
Rowing on the Danube and Naab: When rowing in university sports, you can learn the 
common boat maneuvers, team coordination in a stable double four, as well as steering 
and balance in a narrow single. Participation is only possible for experienced swimmers 
/ free swimmers and only if there are no health concerns about the sport of rowing. 
All course participants (including free rowing) are recommended to take out liability 
insurance. Beginners' course: Learning the basics of rowing technique; depending 
on the temperature, wind and water level, approximately the first half of the semester 
as a team in a double four and the second in a single (racing boat form). Meeting 
point: Boathouse of the Regensburg Rowing Club, Messerschmittstrasse 2




	de: Rudern A

 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}

 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Rudern auf
Donau und Naab<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE"> 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Beim Rudern im
Hochschulsport könnt ihr die gängigen Bootsmanöver, die Mannschaftskoordination
im stabilen Doppelvierer sowie das Steuern und die Balance im schmalen Einer
lernen. 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;<span style="font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Erlernen der
Grundlagen der Rudertechnik; je nach Temperatur, Wind und Pegelstand ungefähr
die erste Hälfte des Semesters als Mannschaft im Doppelvierer und die zweite im
Einer (Rennbootform).

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Voraussetzungen:

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">ausreichende Schwimmfähigkeit
("Freischwimmer" bzw. Bronzeabzeichen)

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">keine gesundheitlichen Bedenken gegen die
Sportart Rudern

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Empfehlung des Abschließens einer
Haftpflichtversicherung (falls nicht vorhanden) 

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">sorgfältige Lektüre der Fahrtordnung und Revierinfos
sowie die Abgabe der unterschriebenen <span style="color:#4C94D8;mso-themecolor:
text2;mso-themetint:128">Ruder-Bestätigung bei der Kursleitung

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Treffpunkt: Bootshaus des Regensburger Ruderklubs, 
Messerschmittstraße 2



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">




Rudern A1: Ruder-Klub Regensburg Bootshaus 	 Dienstag 15:00 - 16:29 [{'name': 'Sepp 
Espach'}]


	en: Rowing for Beginners
Rowing on the Danube and Naab: When rowing in university sports, you can learn the 
common boat maneuvers, team coordination in a stable double four, as well as steering 
and balance in a narrow single. Participation is only possible for experienced swimmers 
/ free swimmers and only if there are no health concerns about the sport of rowing. 
All course participants (including free rowing) are recommended to take out liability 
insurance. Beginners' course: Learning the basics of rowing technique; depending 
on the temperature, wind and water level, approximately the first half of the semester 
as a team in a double four and the second in a single (racing boat form). Meeting 
point: Boathouse of the Regensburg Rowing Club, Messerschmittstrasse 2




	de: Rudern A

 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}

none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Rudern auf
Donau und Naab<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE"> 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Beim Rudern im
Hochschulsport könnt ihr die gängigen Bootsmanöver, die Mannschaftskoordination
im stabilen Doppelvierer sowie das Steuern und die Balance im schmalen Einer
lernen. 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;<span style="font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Erlernen der
Grundlagen der Rudertechnik; je nach Temperatur, Wind und Pegelstand ungefähr
die erste Hälfte des Semesters als Mannschaft im Doppelvierer und die zweite im
Einer (Rennbootform).

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Voraussetzungen:

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">ausreichende Schwimmfähigkeit
("Freischwimmer" bzw. Bronzeabzeichen)

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">keine gesundheitlichen Bedenken gegen die
Sportart Rudern

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Empfehlung des Abschließens einer
Haftpflichtversicherung (falls nicht vorhanden) 

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">sorgfältige Lektüre der Fahrtordnung und Revierinfos
sowie die Abgabe der unterschriebenen <span style="color:#4C94D8;mso-themecolor:
text2;mso-themetint:128">Ruder-Bestätigung bei der Kursleitung

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Treffpunkt: Bootshaus des Regensburger Ruderklubs, 
Messerschmittstraße 2



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">




Rudern A1: Ruder-Klub Regensburg Bootshaus 2/2 	 Mittwoch 15:00 - 16:29 [{'name': 
'Daniel Baruth'}]


	en: Rowing for Beginners
Rowing on the Danube and Naab: When rowing in university sports, you can learn the 
common boat maneuvers, team coordination in a stable double four, as well as steering 
and balance in a narrow single. Participation is only possible for experienced swimmers 
/ free swimmers and only if there are no health concerns about the sport of rowing. 
All course participants (including free rowing) are recommended to take out liability 
insurance. Beginners' course: Learning the basics of rowing technique; depending 
on the temperature, wind and water level, approximately the first half of the semester 
as a team in a double four and the second in a single (racing boat form). Meeting 
point: Boathouse of the Regensburg Rowing Club, Messerschmittstrasse 2




	de: Rudern A

 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}

none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Rudern auf
Donau und Naab<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE"> 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Beim Rudern im
Hochschulsport könnt ihr die gängigen Bootsmanöver, die Mannschaftskoordination
im stabilen Doppelvierer sowie das Steuern und die Balance im schmalen Einer
lernen. 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;<span style="font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Erlernen der
Grundlagen der Rudertechnik; je nach Temperatur, Wind und Pegelstand ungefähr
die erste Hälfte des Semesters als Mannschaft im Doppelvierer und die zweite im
Einer (Rennbootform).

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Voraussetzungen:

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">ausreichende Schwimmfähigkeit
("Freischwimmer" bzw. Bronzeabzeichen)

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">keine gesundheitlichen Bedenken gegen die
Sportart Rudern

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Empfehlung des Abschließens einer
Haftpflichtversicherung (falls nicht vorhanden) 

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">sorgfältige Lektüre der Fahrtordnung und Revierinfos
sowie die Abgabe der unterschriebenen <span style="color:#4C94D8;mso-themecolor:
text2;mso-themetint:128">Ruder-Bestätigung bei der Kursleitung

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Treffpunkt: Bootshaus des Regensburger Ruderklubs, 
Messerschmittstraße 2



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">




Rudern A1: Ruder-Klub Regensburg Bootshaus 	 Montag 15:00 - 16:29 [{'name': 'Daniel 
Baruth'}]


	en: Rowing for Beginners
Rowing on the Danube and Naab: When rowing in university sports, you can learn the 
common boat maneuvers, team coordination in a stable double four, as well as steering 
and balance in a narrow single. Participation is only possible for experienced swimmers 
/ free swimmers and only if there are no health concerns about the sport of rowing. 
All course participants (including free rowing) are recommended to take out liability 
insurance. Beginners' course: Learning the basics of rowing technique; depending 
on the temperature, wind and water level, approximately the first half of the semester 
as a team in a double four and the second in a single (racing boat form). Meeting 
point: Boathouse of the Regensburg Rowing Club, Messerschmittstrasse 2




	de: Rudern A

 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Rudern auf
Donau und Naab<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE"> 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Beim Rudern im
Hochschulsport könnt ihr die gängigen Bootsmanöver, die Mannschaftskoordination
im stabilen Doppelvierer sowie das Steuern und die Balance im schmalen Einer
lernen. 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;<span style="font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Erlernen der
Grundlagen der Rudertechnik; je nach Temperatur, Wind und Pegelstand ungefähr
die erste Hälfte des Semesters als Mannschaft im Doppelvierer und die zweite im
Einer (Rennbootform).

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Voraussetzungen:

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">ausreichende Schwimmfähigkeit
("Freischwimmer" bzw. Bronzeabzeichen)

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:

none;mso-fareast-language:DE">keine gesundheitlichen Bedenken gegen die
Sportart Rudern

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Empfehlung des Abschließens einer
Haftpflichtversicherung (falls nicht vorhanden) 

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">sorgfältige Lektüre der Fahrtordnung und Revierinfos
sowie die Abgabe der unterschriebenen <span style="color:#4C94D8;mso-themecolor:
text2;mso-themetint:128">Ruder-Bestätigung bei der Kursleitung

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Treffpunkt: Bootshaus des Regensburger Ruderklubs, 
Messerschmittstraße 2



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">




Rudern A1: Ruder-Klub Regensburg Bootshaus 2/2 	 Montag 15:00 - 17:59 [{'name': 'Daniel 
Baruth'}]


	en: Rowing for Beginners
Rowing on the Danube and Naab: When rowing in university sports, you can learn the 
common boat maneuvers, team coordination in a stable double four, as well as steering 
and balance in a narrow single. Participation is only possible for experienced swimmers 
/ free swimmers and only if there are no health concerns about the sport of rowing. 
All course participants (including free rowing) are recommended to take out liability 
insurance. Beginners' course: Learning the basics of rowing technique; depending 
on the temperature, wind and water level, approximately the first half of the semester 
as a team in a double four and the second in a single (racing boat form). Meeting 
point: Boathouse of the Regensburg Rowing Club, Messerschmittstrasse 2




	de: Rudern A

	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;

	font-size:11.0pt;

	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}

 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Rudern auf
Donau und Naab<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE"> 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Beim Rudern im
Hochschulsport könnt ihr die gängigen Bootsmanöver, die Mannschaftskoordination
im stabilen Doppelvierer sowie das Steuern und die Balance im schmalen Einer
lernen. 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;<span style="font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Erlernen der
Grundlagen der Rudertechnik; je nach Temperatur, Wind und Pegelstand ungefähr
die erste Hälfte des Semesters als Mannschaft im Doppelvierer und die zweite im
Einer (Rennbootform).

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Voraussetzungen:

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">ausreichende Schwimmfähigkeit
("Freischwimmer" bzw. Bronzeabzeichen)

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">keine gesundheitlichen Bedenken gegen die
Sportart Rudern

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Empfehlung des Abschließens einer
Haftpflichtversicherung (falls nicht vorhanden) 

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">sorgfältige Lektüre der Fahrtordnung und Revierinfos
sowie die Abgabe der unterschriebenen <span style="color:#4C94D8;mso-themecolor:
text2;mso-themetint:128">Ruder-Bestätigung bei der Kursleitung

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Treffpunkt: Bootshaus des Regensburger Ruderklubs, 
Messerschmittstraße 2



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">




Rudern F1: Ruder-Klub Regensburg Bootshaus 	 Dienstag 16:30 - 17:59 [{'name': 'Erik 
Gerhart'}]


	en: Rowing Advanced
Rowing on the Danube and Naab: When rowing in university sports, you can learn the 
common boat maneuvers, team coordination in a stable double four, and steering and 
balance in a narrow single. Participation is only possible for experienced swimmers/free 
swimmers and only if there are no health concerns about the sport of rowing. All 
course participants (including free rowing) are recommended to take out liability 
insurance. Advanced course: Learning and improving rowing technique, increasing safety 
when steering the boat (preferably in a single). The goal is independent, roadworthy, 
material-friendly rowing in accordance with the rowing and driving regulations. Requirements: 
Safe driving of large boats, submission of the completed and signed rowing confirmation 
to the course leader and knowledge of the driving regulations. Meeting point: Boathouse 
of the Regensburg Rowing Club, Messerschmittstrasse 2




	de: Rudern F

 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Rudern auf
Donau und Naab<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE"> 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Beim Rudern im
Hochschulsport könnt ihr die gängigen Bootsmanöver, die Mannschaftskoordination
im stabilen Doppelvierer sowie das Steuern und die Balance im schmalen Einer
lernen. 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;<span style="font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE"> 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Erlernen und
Verbesserung der Rudertechnik, Erhöhung der Sicherheit beim Steuern des Bootes
(bevorzugt im Einer). Ziel ist das selbstständige, verkehrssichere,
materialschonende Rudern gemäß der Ruder- und Fahrtordnung. 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Voraussetzungen:

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">sicheres Großbootfahren

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">ausreichende Schwimmfähigkeit
("Freischwimmer" bzw. Bronzeabzeichen)

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">keine gesundheitlichen Bedenken gegen die
Sportart Rudern

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Empfehlung des Abschließens einer
Haftpflichtversicherung (falls nicht vorhanden) 

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">sorgfältige Lektüre der Fahrtordnung und Revierinfos
sowie die Abgabe der unterschriebenen <span style="color:#4C94D8;mso-themecolor:
text2;mso-themetint:128">Ruder-Bestätigung bei der Kursleitung

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Treffpunkt: Bootshaus des Regensburger Ruderklubs, 
Messerschmittstraße 2




Rudern F1: Ruder-Klub Regensburg Bootshaus 2/2 	 Donnerstag 15:00 - 16:29 [{'name': 
'Benedikt Lintl'}]


	en: Rowing Advanced
Rowing on the Danube and Naab: When rowing in university sports, you can learn the 
common boat maneuvers, team coordination in a stable double four, and steering and 
balance in a narrow single. Participation is only possible for experienced swimmers/free 
swimmers and only if there are no health concerns about the sport of rowing. All 
course participants (including free rowing) are recommended to take out liability 
insurance. Advanced course: Learning and improving rowing technique, increasing safety 
when steering the boat (preferably in a single). The goal is independent, roadworthy, 
material-friendly rowing in accordance with the rowing and driving regulations. Requirements: 
Safe driving of large boats, submission of the completed and signed rowing confirmation 
to the course leader and knowledge of the driving regulations. Meeting point: Boathouse 
of the Regensburg Rowing Club, Messerschmittstrasse 2




	de: Rudern F

 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Normale Tabelle";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:"";
	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin-top:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	mso-para-margin-left:0cm;
	line-height:107%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Aptos",sans-serif;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Aptos;
	mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;
	mso-ligatures:standardcontextual;
	mso-fareast-language:EN-US;}



<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Rudern auf
Donau und Naab<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE"> 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Beim Rudern im
Hochschulsport könnt ihr die gängigen Bootsmanöver, die Mannschaftskoordination
im stabilen Doppelvierer sowie das Steuern und die Balance im schmalen Einer
lernen. 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;<span style="font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE"> 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Erlernen und
Verbesserung der Rudertechnik, Erhöhung der Sicherheit beim Steuern des Bootes
(bevorzugt im Einer). Ziel ist das selbstständige, verkehrssichere,
materialschonende Rudern gemäß der Ruder- und Fahrtordnung. 

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times 
New Roman&quot;;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Voraussetzungen:

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">sicheres Großbootfahren

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">ausreichende Schwimmfähigkeit
("Freischwimmer" bzw. Bronzeabzeichen)

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">keine gesundheitlichen Bedenken gegen die
Sportart Rudern

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Empfehlung des Abschließens einer
Haftpflichtversicherung (falls nicht vorhanden) 

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:
auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none;mso-fareast-language:DE">·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">sorgfältige Lektüre der Fahrtordnung und Revierinfos
sowie die Abgabe der unterschriebenen <span style="color:#4C94D8;mso-themecolor:
text2;mso-themetint:128">Ruder-Bestätigung bei der Kursleitung

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-bottom:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">&nbsp;

<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none;mso-fareast-language:DE">Treffpunkt: Bootshaus des Regensburger Ruderklubs, 
Messerschmittstraße 2




Run Club: Treffpunkt Eingang Sportzentrum 	 Dienstag 06:00 - 06:59 [{'name': 'Marina 
Windisch'}, {'name': 'Lasse Schneider'}, {'name': 'Leo Mauritz'}]


	en: Run Club
Start your day with a run! Our Morning Run Club welcomes runners of all levels who 
enjoy training in a group. Whether you prefer a relaxed jog or a more challenging 
workout, you'll find the right pace with us.
To ensure that everyone runs in a suitable group, please provide your running performance 
level in the survey during registration.




	de: Run Club
Starte deinen Tag mit einem gemeinsamen Lauf! Unser Run Club richtet sich an alle, 
die gerne in der Gruppe laufen – unabhängig vom individuellen Tempo. Ob du entspannt 
in den Tag joggen oder ein anspruchsvolles Training absolvieren möchtest, hier findest 
du die passende Laufgruppe.Um sicherzustellen, dass jeder in einer geeigneten Gruppe 
läuft, bitten wir dich, bei der Reservierung deine Laufleistung in unserer Umfrage 
anzugeben.
